com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.phase

Interface Phase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tickable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPhase, DummyPhase, EditModePhase, GracePhase, LobbyPhase, LobbyWithVotePhase, TimedPhase

    public interface Phase
extends Tickable
    A Phase is directly tied to a Game. A Phase is a collection of Feature. A Phase is directly linked to the next Phase.

    • Method Summary
